member.name: M:Olve.Grids.Generation.BrushGrid.VerifyPosition(Olve.Utilities.IntegerMath2D.Position)
member.summary: Verifies that the position is within the bounds of the grid.
member.exception: Thrown if the position is outside the bounds of the grid.

member.name: P:Olve.Grids.Generation.TileAtlas.FallbackTileIndex
member.summary: The tile to use when contradictory Brush and Adjacency rules are found. Defaults to the last tile in the atlas.
